template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the education domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: Coordinate new student enrollment by verifying prerequisite completion, resolving schedule conflicts, updating the SIS and LMS, and delivering a finalized class schedule to the student.
message.reasoning_content:

Let me break down the requirements: education domain, end-to-end operation, coordination of tools, at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering an outcome. 

A student enrollment scenario comes to mindâ€”it naturally involves checking prerequisites (constraint), updating SIS and LMS (systems), and finalizing the schedule (outcome). 

Need to keep it under 40 words. Can phrase it as a single sentence focusing on the key actions: verify, resolve, update, and deliver. 

The prompt should flow naturally while hitting all the checkpoints without extra details.
